name: Sword of the Elements
description:
Prepare to adventure to the world’s end, beginning your epic journey in the Alfuria world! The prophecy about you has been fulfilled and now it is you who can get the Sword of the Twenty Three Elements to battle with the greatest evil. The most terrible war is coming. The forces of darkness will decimate all before it. The fate of everyone lies in your hands.

Are you ready to the journey to the world’s end?
